title: Madonna Criticizes Instagram for Removing Photos
sub_head: Pop-music pioneer says her post was censored because part of her nipple was showing
body:
Madonna publicly criticized Instagram over the companyâ€™s removal of photos from her page, saying that her post was censored because part of her nipple was showing.
In a post on her verified account Thursday, the 63-year-old pop-music pioneer said she had decided to repost the 10 photos, which show the singer in a variety of poses wearing fishnet stockings in a bedroom. In the slideshow, a heart emoji covers her nipple in three of the images.
